game.name: Metal Hunter
game.genres: Adventure, Indie, RPG, Free To Play
game.shortDescription: This is an imitation of a JRPG with a dual system of humans and tanks. In the ruined wasteland world, humans drive chariots to hunt down various monsters and hunt down powerful wanted criminals. These people are known as 'Metal Hunters' by the world!
